page.title: 02CLUBS IN CHERRY WILLINGHAM
page.content: In Reepham there are six clubs or groups. These range from the Brownies for the youngest to the friendship club for O.A.P.'s. Between these comes the Tufty Club, the Ladies Club and the Womens Institute. In Cherry Willingham there is a larger range of clubs and societies. For the younger ones there are toddler groups, play groups, mother and child groups to name a few. For the slightly older ones there are brownies,beavers, cubs, guides, scouts and ventures along with the Girls Friendly Society and the Youth Club. For the aged there is a Forget-me-Not club which meets for lunch and get-togethers. For adults in general there are the usual football and cricket clubs as well as clubs for bowls, gardening and local history.There is also a local drama group. E.CHAPMAN
